Title: Teresa
Writer: Alfred Hayes (story), Stewart Stern (screenplay), Stewart Stern (story)
Actors: Pier Angeli, John Ericson, Patricia Collinge, Richard Bishop
Plot: A reluctant soldier, Peter, serves in Italy during WWII. He marries a local girl named Teresa and brings her to the US.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 1 nomination.
